name: Instituut voor Infrastructuur, Milieu en Innovatie
goal: Ontwikkelen van demonstratieprojecten die aantonen dat economische ontwikkelingen kunnen samengaan met milieuverbetering.
interests: Banking and financial services, Borders and Security, Climate Action, Customs, Digital economy and society, Energy, Enlargement, Environment, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, International co-operation and development, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Regional Policy, Single market, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives:
- Renewable Energy Directive
- Drones regulation
- Water Framework Directive
- Habitats Directive
- Blue Economy
